original_title: ザ・テンプターズ  涙のあとに微笑みを
overview: Layabout teen Shoken is dissatisfied with his nagging single mother and bullies at school. He and his friends decide to form a cool rock band, but when Shoken learns that his mother is actually his aunt and his parents died, he becomes very agitated and runs away from home.
title: The Tempters: Smile After Tears
